model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Board class stores a 2D array of Tiles that will be used to represent the model of each player's game board.
    Author:
    Group 9

        y - Y position to be attacked (1 - 7)

      • checkVictory

        public boolean checkVictory()
        Checks for victory of either player
        Returns:
        Returns false if neither player has won, else returns true if currentPlayer has won
